resources.string:
We respect your privacy.
 
 This app does not collect, store, or share any personal data.
 
 We do not use advertisements, analytics, or third-party services.
 
 For any questions, contact us at: metbit.app@gmail.com

This app is independently developed by a Computer Science student at New York University. The developer previously majored in museology and is now dedicated to using technology to reinterpret art and history. The Metropolitan Museum of Art houses an immense and profound collection that often feels overwhelming.\n \n To make it more approachable, I have carefully selected iconic artifacts and distilled their essence—so that users may, in the words of a Chinese proverb, “see the whole through a single piece” and explore the beauty of art with ease.
